SEARCH
Package controllers

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
controllers.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
MainController is responsible for handling the logic and user interactions of the main application. It connects the GUI elements with the backend models, such as user login, registration, game start, score saving, and more.
